title: BistroEphemere
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Raw, Western, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Seasonal operation from mid-June to mid-October only, a little restaurant offering weekly changing menu. Makes food in-house. There's always a raw item (like wrap, dehydrated tomato sandwich, vegetable pasta, or falafel) and a vegetarian one (like lasagna, nachos, chili, moussaka, or dhaal). Some snacks and raw desserts.
